Module kivakit.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.language.reflection.property

Interface PropertyFilter

All Known Implementing Classes:
AllFields, AllMethods, NamedField, NamedMethod, PropertySet
public interface PropertyFilter
A filter that determines how a Property field or method can be accessed.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static PropertyFilter
    allProperties(PropertyMemberSelector... included)
    Returns the specified members as a property filter, which selects only these members.
    static PropertyFilter
    beansProperties(PropertyMemberSelector... included)
    Returns the specified members as a property filter, which selects only these members.
    boolean
    includeAsGetter(Method method)
    True if the given method should be included as a property getter
    boolean
    includeAsSetter(Method method)
    True if the given method should be included as a property setter
    boolean
    includeField(Field field)
    True if the given field should be included
    static PropertyFilter
    kivakitProperties(PropertyMemberSelector... included)
    Returns the specified members as a property filter, which selects only these members.
    String
    nameForField(Field field)
    The name of the field
    String
    nameForMethod(Method method)
    A non-camelcase name of the method

  • Method Details

    • allProperties

      static PropertyFilter allProperties(PropertyMemberSelector... included)
      Returns the specified members as a property filter, which selects only these members. Both Java Beans and KivaKit style properties are included.

    • beansProperties

      static PropertyFilter beansProperties(PropertyMemberSelector... included)
      Returns the specified members as a property filter, which selects only these members. Only JavaBeans properties are included.

    • kivakitProperties

      static PropertyFilter kivakitProperties(PropertyMemberSelector... included)
      Returns the specified members as a property filter, which selects only these members. Only KivaKit style properties are included.

    • includeAsGetter

      boolean includeAsGetter(Method method)
      True if the given method should be included as a property getter

    • includeAsSetter

      boolean includeAsSetter(Method method)
      True if the given method should be included as a property setter

    • includeField

      boolean includeField(Field field)
      True if the given field should be included

    • nameForField

      String nameForField(Field field)
      The name of the field

    • nameForMethod

      String nameForMethod(Method method)
      A non-camelcase name of the method
